name: soda-pop
effect: Used on a party Pokémon : Restores 60 HP.

flavor_text.diamond_pearl: A fizzy soda drink. It restores the HP of one Pokémon by 60 points.
flavor_text.platinum: A fizzy soda drink. It restores the HP of one Pokémon by 60 points.
flavor_text.heartgold_soulsilver: A fizzy soda drink. It restores the HP of one Pokémon by 60 points.
